code.map

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.map.MapModel

  • public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The MapModel class is the model class for the map object. The map details are stored in this class. The map editing is also performed using the methods exposed by this class. Further map validation operation is also implemented here which should be called before saving the map model object for ensuring map correctness.
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Lokesh, Umer

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapModel

        public MapModel(java.lang.String mapName,
                int[][] mapArray)
        Constructor method of the class to create a map model from an already existing file. The map array and the map name needs to be passed to the constructor for the model initialization.
        Parameters:
        mapName - name of the map (usually the filename)
        mapArray - the map array of the model (usually read from the file)

      • MapModel

        public MapModel(int row,
                int col)
        Constructor method to create a new map model. The size of the map array to be created is passed to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        row - number of rows in the map
        col - number of columns in the map

    • Method Detail

      • GetName

        public java.lang.String GetName()
        Method to return the name of the current map object.
        Returns:
        name of the map.

      • GetMapArray

        public int[][] GetMapArray()
        This method returns the map array of the current map model object.
        Returns:
        the map model array

      • AddToMap

        public java.lang.Boolean AddToMap(int type,
                                  int row,
                                  int col)
        Method to add a map object to the current map. The map object to be added can be a start point specified by 1, end point specified by 9999 or a path specified by a number between 1 and 9999
        Parameters:
        type - type of the map object to be added
        row - row position of the map where object is to be added
        col - column position of the map where the object is to be added
        Returns:
        if the map object has been successfully added to the map.

      • DeleteFromMap

        public java.lang.Boolean DeleteFromMap(int row,
                                       int col)
        Method to delete a map object from the map from the specified position.
        Parameters:
        row - row position of the map where object is to be deleted
        col - column position of the map where the object is to be deleted
        Returns:
        if the map object has been successfully deleted from the map.

      • validateMap

        public boolean validateMap()
        Method to validate the current map model object. The methods checks if the map is a valid map containing a start point, an end point and a continuous path between them. It also checks if there is no orphan path in the map.
        Returns:
        if the map is a valid map
